data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
CEDICT is a well-known Chinese/English dictionary file
    <http://www.mandarintools.com/cedict.html>. This module provides
    easy access to the data (via MySQL/Storable/Textfile) and adds some
    convenience features (simplified characters, "beautification" for
    tone marks)

    The code itself is licensed under the same terms as Perl, but the
    dictionary data may only be used for non-commercial projects --
    hence the restricted license.
